name: Project RedCube
description:
Control the RedCube through the endless void. Welcome, to Project RedCube.

This game uses Brackey's Unity game tutorial, and this is evident in the game design and base mechanics, although more changes will be brought to differentiate it from the tutorial, some already here are the facts that the game is endless and has sfx.

Some scripts in this game are loosely based on Practical Programming's tile generation scripts.

This is my first game in Unity, so I apologize for any bugs.
